title: Man Slamming Congress in Video is Not Varanasi Candidate Ajai Rai
subtitle: Varanasi Congress Candidate Ajai Rai Viral Video Fact Check: A viral video, tweeted by several pro-BJP supporters on social media shows man slamming the Congress party for its dynastic politics.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video, shared by several pro-BJP supporters on social media shows man slamming the Congress party for its dynastic politics, while also praising Narendra Modi for taking on the mother-son duo.

The man in the video speaks as though he is part of the Congress party, referring to a "core committee meeting", and calling the Congress party "his party."

The video has been shared by several persons on Twitter, including filmmaker Ashoke Pandit, who claimed that the man in the video was the Opposition's candidate from Varanasi – Ajai Rai. Pandit’s tweet is now deleted.
